update t_version
plateform = #{plateform,jdbcType=CHAR},
version_no = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version_url = #{versionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_force = #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_version set plateform = #{plateform,jdbcType=CHAR}, version_no = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_url = #{versionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_force = #{isForce,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_desc = #{updateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select config_id, config_name, config_key, config_value, config_description, create_time from t_system_config where config_key = #{config_key}
